Posts.Content: Mohit wrote: hello, My mother's age is 51 We had a FNAC test on her right breast and the microscopy came as : "Smears show maligant cells in clusters and despersed singly having hyperchromatic, pleomorphic nuclei, prominent nucleoli and mooderate amount of cytoplasm. Background shows few clusters of benign ductal cells. Impression : Duct carcinoma. " I do not understand these scientific words. There is a lot of tension. Can u please help me with a basic explanation and tell whether there is any risk? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Benign ductal cells Mohit BarredOwl
